summary: REQ-45 appears implemented: the footer “Contact Us” now calls useRouteTransition().startTransition('/telegram'). However, the diff also makes substantial unrequested changes to the footer’s content/layout and modifies Terms/Privacy behavior, which violates the request’s constraint to only rewire the existing “Contact Us” click action.

hallucinated_features.description: Major footer redesign/content changes (e.g., adding “Industry Recognition”, “Elon Musk” section, and a Tesla-associated companies grid) instead of only wiring the existing “Contact Us” action.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to change any other footer layout/content beyond wiring the existing “Contact Us” click action.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed/introduced explicit route-transition handlers for “Terms & Conditions” and “Privacy Policy” (startTransition('/terms') and startTransition('/privacy')) and converted legal links into buttons with onClick handlers.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-45 only requests updating the “Contact Us” action; Terms/Privacy links were to remain working “as-is” and not be modified beyond ensuring they’re not broken.
